title: OpenAI, TCS In Talks For Major India AI Push, Eye Agentic AI Solutions For Enterprises
description: OpenAI is in talks with Tata Consultancy Services to expand AI infrastructure in India, co-develop agentic AI solutions, and lease HyperVault data centre capacity.

title: Elon Musk’s xAI Colossus: AI Powerhouse Sparks Memphis Pollution Concerns
description: Elon Musk's xAI built Colossus, the world's most powerful AI supercomputer, in a Memphis factory, promising jobs and innovation with 100,000 GPUs. However, gas turbines cause pollution and health issues in the Black Boxtown community. Plans for a solar farm aim to mitigate impacts, highlighting tensions between tech progress and local well-being.

title: Anthropic CEO Warns of AI Bubble from Reckless YOLO Spending
description: Dario Amodei, Anthropic's CEO, warns of reckless "YOLO" spending in the AI industry, criticizing circular deals and overhyped investments that risk creating a bubble. Amid concerns from figures like Mark Cuban, Anthropic emphasizes safety while planning a potential 2026 IPO. This highlights tensions between rapid scaling and long-term sustainability.

title: UiPath beats expectations as it doubles down on agentic AI orchestration
description: Business automation software company UiPath Inc. beat expectations for its third-quarter financial results today and followed up with strong guidance for the current quarter.
